entries.title: Check out my Github
entries.content: The source code for all my projects is located on my Github. My notes, practice projects, and even my recipes are stored there.

entries.title: Red White and Brew
entries.content: I'm proud to be a founding member of the Red White and Brew Beer Company, to be located in/around Swedesboro, New Jersey. I also designed and host the brewery's website (currently under construction). I started brewing back in 2012 when I bought a homebrewing kit on a whim. I'd always been interested in craft beer, but once I started brewing for myself it became a passion. So when my friend Chris (also a homebrewer) asked me if I would be interested in opening a microbrewery, my answer was an emphatic yes! We plan to open mid-end of 2017.
